item.title: A Hole in the Forehead
item.description: A Hole in the Forehead is a 1968 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Giuseppe Vari.

item.title: Ciccio Forgives
item.description: Ciccio perdona... Io no!, internationally known as Ciccio Forgives, I Don't, is a 1968 Italian comedy film directed by Marcello Ciorciolini. It is a spaghetti western parody of God Forgives... I Don't!.

item.title: Paths of War
item.description: Paths of War is a 1970 Italian western-comedy film directed by Aldo Grimaldi.

item.title: The Forgotten Pistolero
item.description: The Forgotten Pistolero is a 1969 Italian Spaghetti Western film co-written and directed by Ferdinando Baldi. The film is a western adaptation of the Greek myth of Orestes, subject of three famous drama-plays by Aeschylus, Sophocles and Euripides. Ulrich P. Bruckner puts it among the "most interesting and most touching Spaghetti Westerns of the late sixties".
